page.title: 02AINSDALE CLUB
page.content: THE AINSDALE CLUB WAS FORMED IN 1911. SEVERAL SPORTS ARE CATERED FOR INCLUDING FOOTBALL, CRICKET,BOWLS AND TENNIS. THERE ARE 3 FOOTBALL AND 2 CRICKET TEAMS, 8 TENNIS COURTS AND A CLUBHOUSE WITH A BAR AND CHANGING ROOMS. MANY PUPILS FROM LOCAL SCHOOLS ARE MEMBERS AND PLAY THERE EVERY NIGHT. THE BOWLING CLUB HAS BEEN GOING FOR 8 YEARS AND HAS 110 MEMBERS WITH 3 MENS AND 1 WOMANS TEAMS. ARCHERY IS ALSO POPULAR WITH COMPETITIONS EVERY YEAR. THERE ARE ABOUT 100 MEMBERS IN THE TENNIS CLUB AND THERE IS COACHING EVERY SATURDAY MORNING.
